prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon that embodies nature with vibrant green and blue colors.
Design a fairy-type Pokemon with delicate wings and a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that can manipulate time and features a soft, ethereal appearance.
Generate a unique Pokemon that thrives in forests, showcasing shades of green.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the spirit of the forest with gentle colors.
Make a healing-type Pokemon that has a whimsical look and calming presence.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a small fairy, with bright eyes and graceful wings.
